name: Lucky Buddies
description:
Welcome to Lucky Buddies
Do you have what it takes to join the Lucky Buddies team? Buckle up and prepare for an adventure! Build your dream team with Thor the VIKING, Mia the Cat-Woman, Leo the Lion-King, and the rest of the buddies for a glorious win! Straight from the seven seas emerged the devious enemy and stole the good fortune from the world, it is now up to our Viking and his Lucky Buddies to bring it back to its rightful owners and they need your help!

- Unlock new Buddies and expand your team
- Upgrade your Viking and his Buddies and equip them for battle
- Spin the Lucky reels for coins and complete your daily goals
- Release the dragons from the dragon's Island
- Snag & Brag - Snag your friends’ treasure and brag about your glorious attack
- Strike! Attack other teams and get an advantage in your race to 1st place
- Win tournaments and collect trophies
- Create or join a clan to join forces with friends and attack as a team at this great adventure
- Collect Lucky Cards for great rewards

Get ready for an epic time on Lucky Buddies: the more buddies you collect, the stronger you get!

- Special events and amazing new worlds await you inside, so get your Facebook friends onboard and join the team!

- Follow us on Facebook for exclusive rewards and become a part of the Lucky Buddies community!
https://www.facebook.com/luckybuddiesgame
